newsitem.title: USA: US debt futures end lackluster day narrowly mixed.
newsitem.headline: US debt futures end lackluster day narrowly mixed.

text.p: Aug 22 - U.S. debt futures ended another lackluster day narrowly mixed. Bonds eased slightly, as some dealers and funds liquidated positions. Some unwinding of long bond/short foreign bond spreas was noted. Front-month Euros were higher, deferreds unchanged. Locals are heavily short Sept Euros. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
